embed.title: GobBot Info
embed.description: Below is a list of commands:

fields.name: !changeprefix
fields.value:
Example: '!changeprefix -' 
This changes the prefix for all commands

fields.name: !bitch
fields.value:
Example '!bitch on' 
Turns on bitch mode, this replaces all messages that aren't the specified persons with a meme

fields.name: !listen
fields.value:
Example '!listen on' 
Joins the specified channel in the config and listens for when a specified person speaks, then mutes them

fields.name: !listentarget
fields.value: Example '!listentarget [username]' changes the target for the listen command

fields.name: !listenchannel
fields.value: Example '!listenchannel [ChannelID]' takes in a channel ID (Google how to find this), this will be the channel the bot connects to when the listen command is called
